string-array.name: faq_questions
string-array.item: Is Crater only for the Passion Economy?

string-array.name: faq_answers
string-array.item: Crater is an all in one finance management app for the Passion Economy (Creators, Freelancers and Solo Entrepreneurs).
Features include Early Pay, Invoicing, Revenue Management, Expense Management, Payments, Digital Insurances and Tax Filing.
Yes! Crater’s features are personalized for the use of Creators, Freelancers and Solo Entrepreneurs.
Crater allow users to access their Invoice and Social Media earnings on demand. Users pay Crater the amount once the invoice is paid or they get the social media payout.
Users can track their revenue from all platforms and invoices in a single dashboard. Don’t have to open several different apps just to check statistics.
Crater organizes all the user’s transactions under a single dashboard. User can differentiate their business expense from personal expense.
Safety is priority for Crater. The data stored is encrypted and is not shared with any third party.

string-array.name: features_have
string-array.item: Manage all your Social Media platforms at one place

string-array.name: features_need
string-array.item: A Virtual Bank Account for your business
Accept payments from Social Media platforms, Invoices and Brand Deals
Track Business expenses by Using Crater cash for payments
Get rewarded every time you transact using Crater Cash
File taxes in less than 10 minutes
